basics.description:
Deploy BrowserBox on Azure

Quickly set up a [BrowserBox](https://github.com/BrowserBox/BrowserBox) Remote Browser in just 3 steps. After setup, you'll receive an email with your BrowserBox Login Link. By providing your email, you accept [our terms](https://dosyago.com/terms.txt), [privacy policy](https://dosyago.com/privacy.txt), and LetsEncrypt's terms. **Next Steps Guide** 1. Select or create a Resource group in an [*Azure Region*](https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/explore/global-infrastructure/geographies/) near you - ***low ping matters!*** 2. Optionally modify the Operating System and Machine Size, and explore *Advanced Settings*. 3. Finally, enter Your Email and click *Create* to initiate your BrowserBox system. Azure will set up your resources and send the BrowserBox Login Link within 10-15 minutes. For help and support at any time email us. To purchase a license visit [our website](https://dosyago.com) or contact us at: licenses@dosyago.com, or on Signal and we'll do our best to help!

basics.name: adminUsername
basics.label: Admin Username
basics.toolTip: Administrator username for the Virtual Machine.

validations.message: Starts with a letter, then alphanumeric characters are allowed, and the value must be 1-35 characters long.

validations.isValid: [or(            or(  empty(basics('adminUsername')),   and(    not(startsWith(basics('adminUsername'), '[[')),     startsWith(basics('adminUsername'), '['), endsWith(basics('adminUsername'), ']'),     greater(indexOf(basics('adminUsername'), '('), -1), greater(indexOf(basics('adminUsername'), ')'), -1)    )  ),            and(              not(regex(basics('adminUsername'), '/[\\/\"\"\[\]:|<>+=;,$ ?*@]+/')),               not(endsWith(basics('adminUsername'), '.'))              ),            regex(basics('adminUsername'), '^[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$')            )]
validations.message: User name cannot contain special characters \/\"[]:|<>+=;,?*@ or end with '.', and must be between 1 and 15 characters.

validations.isValid: [or(            or(  empty(basics('adminUsername')),   and(    not(startsWith(basics('adminUsername'), '[[')),     startsWith(basics('adminUsername'), '['), endsWith(basics('adminUsername'), ']'),     greater(indexOf(basics('adminUsername'), '('), -1), greater(indexOf(basics('adminUsername'), ')'), -1)    )  ),            equals(              length(filter(                parse('["administrator", "admin", "user", "user1", "test", "user2", "test1", "user3", "admin1", "1", "123", "a", "actuser", "adm", "admin2", "aspnet", "backup", "console", "david", "guest", "john", "owner", "root", "server", "sql", "support", "support_388945a0", "sys", "test2", "test3", "user4", "user5"]'),                (item) => equals(toLower(item), toLower(basics('adminUsername')))              )            ), 0)            )]
validations.message: The specified username is not allowed. Please choose a different value.
